title: Take It Easy
lyrics:
Give me a cigarette but not your smoker's caugh
I wanna push your buttons but don't wanna turn your up
I wanna be the star and I wanna make it rain
So when I burn out I got ice to cool the pain
That's the problem with people like me

Why make it hard, when you could make it easy?

(Take it easy, take-take it easy)

Why work hard, when you can take it easy?

(Take it easy, take-take it easy)



Give me the words of wisdom but don't make me take the class

I wanna fly to the moon but I don't wanna pay for gas

When I stop stop working you could put me in the trash

Or you can use me and you'll get an update that doesn't crush



That's the problem with people like me

Why make it hard, when you could make it easy?

(Take it easy, take-take it easy)

Why work hard, when you can take it easy?

(Take it easy, take-take it easy)



That's the problem with people like me

Why work hard, when you can take it easy?

(Take it easy, take-take it easy)

That's the problem with people like me

Why make it hard, when you could make it easy?

(Take it easy, take-take it easy)

Why work hard, when you can take it easy?

(Take it easy, take-take it easy)

Why work hard, when you can take it easy?
